circuitBreaker().author: Alex Coury
circuitBreaker().details: The stopped bool starts out as false and disables both the contribute and withdraw function when enabled

readCampaign().author: Alex Coury
readCampaign().return: The campaign returns a title, description, minmum contributions allowed (set by owner), targeted fundraising goal,

withdraw().author: Alex Coury
withdraw().details: Only the creator/owner can withdraw the funds

devdoc.author: Alex Coury
devdoc.details: The CrowdFundingFactory enables fluid intialization of a new crowdfunding campaign

circuitBreaker().notice: Circuit Breaker is a design patterns that allow contract functionality to be stopped if a bug is found

contribute().notice: Allows the supporters to contribute to the crowdfunding campaign

readCampaign().notice: Displays the details of the crowdfunding campaign

withdraw().notice: Owner can withdraw the funds of the crowdfund raising contract

userdoc.notice: The owner can use this contract to create a campaign and supporters can contribute to it
